description:
Friendship management tool for VRChat


What's New
- Fresh New Look: A complete UI refresh with more themes, colors, and font options.
- Better Tables: You can now drag to resize columns and customize table styles.
- Easier Dialog Navigation: Major dialogs now use a single-window flow with breadcrumbs to track your path.
- Tools Reorganized: Common shortcuts are now in the "Tools" tab for quicker access.
- Faster & Leaner: Improved stability with significantly lower memory usage.
UI Refresh
- All non-default themes had to be removed.
- New settings.
  - Custom theme colors.
  - Customize font.
- Settings to bring back old behaviours.
  - Table density.
  - Striped table.
  - Show instance names.
  - Cursor pointer.
Additions
- Add VRC+ world groups.
- Table column drag handle for setting custom column widths.
- Copy group event URL to clipboard.
- Sort own avatars by uploaded date.
Changes
- Combined many dialogs into a single dialog.
- Merge overlays, move overlay to its own separate process.
- Launch dialog launch button Desktop/VR buttons.
- Remove just-h avatar search provider, at his point we can safely assume it isn't coming back.
- Moved folder shortcuts, VRChat Config to Tools tab.
- Many performance improvements.
Fixes
- Fix many memory leak related crashes.
- Fix table sorting.
- Fix bio in feed being displayed incorrectly after translation.
- Fix moderated player join notifications.
- Fix opening fullscreen images from feed expanded avatar image.
Linux/macOS (Electron)
- Move Electron userdata folder.
Translation Updates
